revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Crown Shrine |image = [[File:Crown Shrine.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Crown Shrine. |tokens = 2,200,000 |location = North of Path to the Peak }}
<!--T:2--> '''Crown Shrine''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 33,915,762 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Dhelmise.png|40px]] Dhelmise || rowspan=6 colspan=2| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Hatterene.png|40px]] Hatterene |- | [[File:Reuniclus.png|40px]] Reuniclus |- | [[File:Mr. Rime.png|40px]] Mr. Rime |- | [[File:Mamoswine.png|40px]] Mamoswine |- | [[File:Roserade.png|40px]] Roserade |}
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Galarian Rapidash.png|50px]] Galarian Rapidash || rowspan=4| <center>161,099,869 || rowspan=5 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Abomasnow.png|50px]] Abomasnow |- | [[File:Trevenant.png|50px]] Trevenant |- | [[File:Weavile.png|50px]] Weavile |- | [[File:Calyrex.png|50px]] '''Calyrex*''' || <center>169,578,810 |} '''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The Crown of Galar|The Crown of Galar]] Questline to unlock.
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
